name: Choice Aviation, LLC
about: Choice Aviation, LLC is a premier flying school operating in Wyoming and Montana, offering comprehensive flight training programs. With FAA-approved FAR Part 61 and 141 curricula, we provide training for private, commercial, and multi-engine certifications in both fixed-wing and rotor-wing aircraft. Our experienced and friendly FAA Certified Flight Instructors ensure an unmatched learning experience in our well-maintained fleet of Cessnas and helicopters. We also offer an accredited degree program in Aeronautics through Northwest College. Our facilities in Cody, WY, and Hamilton, MT, are equipped with FAA-approved testing centers for all knowledge exams. Students are encouraged to fly regularly to complete courses efficiently. Choice Aviation is dedicated to guiding aspiring pilots through their aviation journey with professionalism and excellence.
